title: Failed to connect after champion select
body:
Hey riotgames  iam having issues when you select a champion and after that the screen goes black and says failed to connect I tried every method from riot support page and looking it up on the internet but none of that help even when I played on the pbe the same problem happends pls tell me what to do 
And ty

replies.body: Failing to reach the game server can indicate a connection problem, further affirmed by the black screen failing to download assets.   Not sure which support page you used, but the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be your best bet to get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helped!
